snippet.title: Mahokenshi trailer (PC Gaming Show 2022)
snippet.description:
Mahokenshi looks a little like a 4X game set in a celestial ancient myth, but the developers say it's "a blend of adventure, strategy and deckbuilding" where you spar with demons, and protect the land from the forces of corruption. The following trailer shows new gameplay from 
Game Source Studio and Iceberg Interactive, as presented at the PC Gaming Show.

Catch everything that was revealed at the PC Gaming Show: https://www.pcgamer.com/how-to-watch-pc-gaming-show-2022/

www.pcgamer.com

We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
